mention.text: this city that for decades has prided itself on a progressive attitude toward civil rights and a reputation for racial harmony
The deaths of two blacks at a drug raid that went awry
two blacks at a drug raid that went awry
a drug raid that went awry
Van Hayden , 25 , a student who says police beat him at the hotel
a problem that is present in all segments of society
then a 35-year-old mayor running for the U.S. Senate
a University of Minnesota student who has been involved in recent protests
charges against those arrested at the hotel
a panel appointed by the mayor
